Question: Lockin(US) Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lockin(US) Inc

CES 2024

- Introducing the latest smart lock technology
- Enhanced security features
- Seamless integration with smart home systems
- Remote access and control via mobile app
- Easy installation and setup
- Multiple access options including keypad, key fob, and smartphone
- Stylish and durable design
- Long-lasting battery life
- Compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant
- Available in various finishes to complement any home aesthetic
Summary_cn:
Lockin（美国）公司

CES 2024

- 最新的智能锁技术介绍
- 加强的安全特性
- 与智能家居系统的无缝集成
- 通过手机应用远程访问和控制
- 安装和设置简便
- 包括按键、钥匙链和智能手机在内的多种访问选项
- 时尚耐用的设计
- 长久的电池续航能力
- 兼容亚马逊Alexa和谷歌助手
- 提供多种颜色选择，以适应任何家居审美
